incident_updates.body:
• 2015-03-29 08:05:16 - Minor service outage.
  • 2015-03-29 08:18:34 - The ongoing DDoS attack has changed tactics. We are experiencing intermittent service outages and working to mitigate.
  • 2015-03-29 10:53:53 - Services are stable as we continue to mitigate against a large scale DDoS attack.
  • 2015-03-29 14:52:39 - The ongoing DDoS attack is affecting connectivity to Gist. We're working to mitigate further disruption.
  • 2015-03-29 17:21:21 - 87 hours in, our mitigation is deflecting most attack traffic. We're aware of intermittent issues and continue to adapt our response.
  • 2015-03-29 19:25:41 - We've adjusted our mitigation tactics and are observing improved TCP performance for the majority of non-attack traffic.
  • 2015-03-30 00:38:27 - All systems reporting at 100%. Attack traffic continues, so we remain on high alert.
  • 2015-03-30 06:46:44 - The DDoS attack has evolved and we are working to mitigate
  • 2015-03-30 11:50:44 - All systems reporting at 100%. Attack traffic continues, so we remain on high alert.
  • 2015-03-30 19:32:39 - After 113 hours of sustained DDoS attacks our defenses are holding. We will keep our status at yellow until the threat has subsided.
  • 2015-03-31 00:09:29 - Hour 118: Mitigation remains effective and service is stable.
  • 2015-03-31 11:11:31 - Everything operating normally.

components.name: Git Operations
components.description: Performance of git clones, pulls, pushes, and associated operations
